data.prayer: Spirit, please equip every disciple to make disciples who make disciples in the state of Ararat.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Ararat, Armenia
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Jesus, please bless the leaders of the the state of Ararat, Armenia who work hard at shepherding and guiding your people.
data.verse: With upright heart he shepherded them and guided them with his skillful hand.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 10 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Lord, please give apostles to expand the church into every neighborhood of Ararat, Armenia.
data.verse: Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you.

data.prayer: Jesus, please raise up evangelists to equip your people to share the gospel in Ararat.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Zangakatun
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Zangakatun, Ararat, Armenia.
Spirit, we know that cultures come and go, even in the state of Ararat, but the truth of your Word endures generations.
data.verse: Your Word, Lord, is eternal; it stands firm in the heavens.

data.prayer: Father, please send new teachers into the harvest, who can correct the lies of our enemy in the state of Ararat, Armenia.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.section_summary:
the state of Ararat, Armenia has a population of 8,300.

We estimate Ararat has 762 people who might know Jesus, 6,913 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 626 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 10 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Jesus, make yourself known to the 8,300 people living in Ararat through the internet today.
data.verse: They have no speech, they use no words; no sound is heard from them. Yet their voice goes out into all the earth, their words to the ends of the world. In the heavens God has pitched a tent for the sun.
